docs.Dataset Status: DRAFTING! This metadata is a test of adding metadata & filling out the recommended fields from the data.ca.gov Open Data Handbook. This data & this metadata is a draft. The RSHO data and tier modifications listed here are old sample data. Up-to-date information can be found at https://covid19.ca.gov.
docs.Title: Reopening Roadmap Activity and Business Search Data
docs.Description: COVID-19 reopening activity and business data sets, with references to related guidance files.
docs.Groups: Office of Digital Innovation, State of California https://ca.gov
docs.Topics: Economy and Demographics, COVID-19, Government, Health & Human Services
docs.Author: covid19.ca.gov - Office of Digital Innovation, State of California

data.RSHO: Closed for on-site consumption. May continue with production, manufacturing, distribution, and retail sale for off-site consumption.

Closed unless used for COVID-19 mitigation and containment measures, treatment measures, providing accommodation for essential workers or those displaced as a result of fire or other emergency, or providing housing solutions, including measures to protect homeless populations.

data.RSHO: Closed for in-state reservations unless used for COVID-19 mitigation and containment measures, treatment measures, accommodation for essential workers or those displaced as a result of fire or other emergency, or housing solutions, including measures to protect homeless populations. Open for non-essential, out-of-state reservations so long as reservation is at least the minimum time period required for quarantine.

data.override_industry_guidance_label: Outdoor recreation, including campgrounds, playgrounds and ski resorts
data.RSHO: Can open with modifications  - No food or beverages sold for onsite consumption

data.4 - WIDESPREAD: Are allowed outdoors only with modifications - Masks and physical distancing required - No more than 3 separate households attend (including the host's) - Gatherings should be 2 hours or less - Those with symptoms must not attend - Those at high risk of severe illness strongly encouraged not to attend - Singing, shouting, chanting, cheering, or exercising strongly discouraged
data.3 - SUBSTANTIAL: Are allowed outdoors and indoors with modifications - Masks and physical distancing required - No more than 3 separate households attend (including the host's) - Gatherings should be 2 hours or less - Those with symptoms must not attend - Those at high risk of severe illness strongly encouraged not to attend - Singing, shouting, chanting, cheering, or exercising strongly discouraged outdoors and not permitted indoors
data.2 - MODERATE: Are allowed outdoors and indoors with modifications - Masks and physical distancing required - No more than 3 separate households attend (including the host's) - Gatherings should be 2 hours or less - Those with symptoms must not attend - Those at high risk of severe illness strongly encouraged not to attend - Singing, shouting, chanting, cheering, or exercising strongly discouraged outdoors and not permitted indoors
data.1 - MINIMAL: Are allowed outdoors and indoors with modifications - Masks and physical distancing required - No more than 3 separate households attend (including the host's) - Gatherings should be 2 hours or less - Those with symptoms must not attend - Those at high risk of severe illness strongly encouraged not to attend - Singing, shouting, chanting, cheering, or exercising strongly discouraged outdoors and not permitted indoors
